name: Complete a hole with a par or better, redlining every shot (excludes putting, Golf)
Trigger the ‘Extra Time Goals’ Easter Egg [Hit crossbar and score] (Football Free Practice)
Score a point in 2 shots or less (Serve counts as 1 shot, Tennis)
Win a round with only thrust attacks (Chambara)
Win with the Twin Swords without using a Spinning Strike (Chambara)
Win a match without conceding a goal (Four-on-Four Football)
Win with the (Regular) Sword without blocking (Chambara)
Win against strong CPUs or higher, controlling both characters (Volleyball)
Complete 3 Hole Special with +1 or better (Golf)
Win a point by 'Block Out' (Volleyball)
Hit three 'X3' spikes in a single point (Volleyball)
Strikes or Spares Only (Except 12th Throw, Intermediate Special Bowling or higher)
Score with a diving header (Football)
Return a ‘Super Smash’ successfully (Badminton)
Score 200 or higher (Bowling)
Complete a hole using the wedge and putter only, without reaching the stroke limit (Golf)
Win a round, attacking less than three times (No Sudden Death, Chambara)
Score 50 in the Staff Credits minigame
Strike (Advanced Special Bowling)
Win against a powerhouse CPU or higher, controlling two characters individually (Tennis)
Score with a curved kick (Football)
Beat the Football (One-on-One) Mii Legend
Draw in Sudden Death (Chambara)
Score a point against a strong CPU or higher, front player only (Tennis, serving doesn’t count)
Win a point without using a ‘Super Smash’ (Badminton)
